name: To Play or Not to Play!
name_original: To Play or Not to Play!
description:
~~ THE PLAY IS THE THING! ~~

In To Play or Not to Play! you control young actor Niles Stiffcroft who is starring in the experimental play: "A Significant Pancake."  

Niles plays John Horatio Jones, a young nobleman who will embark on an investigation of lies, infidelity, and batter-based revelations... as well as the dreaded secret ingredient of the infernal pancake.


~~ HOW TO PLAY (WITHIN THE PLAY) ~~

As an accomplished actor Niles Stiffcroft only needs a few moment to learn his part. Quickly glance over the script and try to remember your lines and direction. 

But how Niles will bring his performance to life? The script is out of your control, but the interpretation is up to you.

Curtains up!

~~ CONTROLS ~~

  • A/D - to move left/right
  • E - Interact
  • Space - Jump (Please stop jumping)
  • ESC - Pause the game

~~ CAST & CREW ~~

  • Neil Doyle 
  • Azure Leaf  
  • James Nowlan 
  • Kuhaku Pixel
  • Octavian Taralunga
